data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The rutting, or mating, season lasts from June through September, with peak activity in July and August. At ____ time, the ____ bulls ____ the ____, ____ fights ____ take ____ between ____. The ____ exhibits ____ restlessness ____ breeding ____. The animals are belligerent, unpredictable, and most dangerous.
data.partBlankContent: The rutting, or mating, season lasts from June through September, with peak activity in July and August. At th__ time, the ol___ bulls rej___ the he__, a__ fights of___ take pl___ between bu___. The he__ exhibits mu__ restlessness dur___ breeding sea___. The animals are belligerent, unpredictable, and most dangerous.
data.answer: 发情或交配的季节从6月持续到9月，高峰在7月和8月。在这个时候，年长的公牛会重新加入牛群中，公牛之间经常会发生争斗。在繁殖季节，牛群表现出极大的不安。这些动物好斗，难以预测，而且是最危险的。
